data.actual_result: You are still able to click the Share button. Doing so makes the screenshare be loading forever.
data.expected_result: The share button should be made unclickable again like it was before selecting anything at all.
data.short_description: If you quit an application while it's selected to screenshare, you can still click to Share
data.steps_to_repro: - Open an application you won't mind closing (without unsaved work, safe to close) - Go to screenshare (tested originally on guild screenshare) - Click to turn on Screenshare - Click "Application Window" in the modal that appears - Click the application from step 1 - Fully quit that application - Go back to Discord and click Share
